# What's Changed

This release is the beta version of the project, that is, the MVP

## Details

- Core commands (create, add, list) : https://github.com/Xavier2p/fortress/pull/19
- Data encryption using Argon2Id and AES-256 : https://github.com/Xavier2p/fortress/pull/19
- Password generation : https://github.com/Xavier2p/fortress/issues/8
- Copy to clipboard : https://github.com/Xavier2p/fortress/issues/9
- Hidden input : https://github.com/Xavier2p/fortress/issues/4
- Global/local store : https://github.com/Xavier2p/fortress/issues/3
- CI Audit workflow : https://github.com/Xavier2p/fortress/pull/20
- CI Tests workflow : https://github.com/Xavier2p/fortress/issues/11
- Auto documentation using `cargo docs` and GitHub pages : https://github.com/Xavier2p/fortress/issues/12
